name: @ferrugemjs/router
description: A basic router implementation with jspmPackage

scripts.build: node node_modules/.bin/tsc --p tsconfig.json && npm run compile:router
scripts.build:test: node node_modules/.bin/tsc --p tsconfig.test.json && npm run compile:test
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run build:test && http-server -p 8114 ./

author: ferrugemjs
